InventoryCntSerializedProdt.name: InventoryCntSerializedProdt
InventoryCntSerializedProdt.description: Represents a serialized product in an inventory count.

InventoryCountAssessmentId.description: The inventory count assessment that's associated with the inventory count serialized product.

InventoryCountProductItemId.description: The inventory count product item that's associated with the inventory count serialized product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: Name of the inventory count serialized product.

SerializedProductId.description: The serialized product that is associated with the inventory count serialized product.
